ceyya Ivarkaḷ tuṇaiyākaveṉṟāreṉiṉum Amaiyum.

div3.head: 102 - 11. kariyavaṉ pukaiyiṉum...Olittal cellā

div4.p:
(I – ḷ.) kōḷkaḷiṟ caṉikkōḷ Iṭapam ciṅkam mīṉameṉṉu
mivaṟṟiṉōṭu māṟupaṭiṉum, Ākāyattē tūmakkōḷ Eḻiṉum, virinta
katiraiyuṭaiya veḷḷikkōḷ teṉṟicaikkaṇṇē peyariṉum kāṟṟup
porum kuṭakavaraiyiṉatu Uccikkaṇṇē kaṭiya kuralaiyuṭaiya Urumēṟ

ṟōṭu cūṉmutirnta paruvappuyal taṉpeyalākiya vaḷattaic curatta
lāṉē Avvaraiyiṟpiṟanta pala paṇṭattōṭu kaṭukivarutalaiyuṭaiya
kāviriyiṉīr, mukattaik kuttiyiṭikkuṅ kaṭal taṉ vaḷattaikkoṇṭu
Etirtalāṉē tēṅki, vāyttalaikkiṭṭa kataviṉmīteḻuntu kutikkiṉṟa
Apputuppuṉa loliyallatu Āmpimutalāyiṉa Olittalcellāveṉka.

kariyavaṉ – caṉi. pukaikkoṭi – vaṭṭam, cilai, nuṭpam, tūmameṉ
ṉum |1 Ivaṟṟaik karantuṟaikōṭkaḷeṉpar.kōṭkaḷ nāṉkiṉum tūmakkōḷ; |“maimmīṉ pukaiyiṉun
tūman tōṉṟiṉum, teṉṟicai maruṅkiṉ veḷḷi yōṭiṉum”
(puṟanā. 117: 1-2) Eṉṟār piṟarum. kālporunivappu – kuṭakiṉ Ucci.
Ēṟu – Iṭiyēṟu. paḵṟāram – paltāram; palapaṇṭam. Eṉavē malaivaḷa
ṉāyiṟṟu; Āvaṉa |“takkōlan......cātiyō ṭaintu” (5: 26, Aṭi
yār.)

kaṭalvaḷaṉāvaṉa: “Ōrkkōlai caṅka moḷirpavaḷam veṇmut
tam, nīrppaṭu muppiṉō ṭaintu.”

kaṭuvaral – muṭukivarumvaravu. Ō – tūmpiṟkatavu; Iṉi Ōvutal,
vikārattāl Ōveṉa niṉṟateṉavumām; Itaṟku Iṟattal Īṇṭut
tavirtaṉ mēṟṟu. Āmpi – paṉṟippattar. kiḻār – pūṭṭaippoṟi.
piḻā - |2 Iṭā – Iṟaikūṭai.Iṭā. “nīrttevvu niraittoḻuvar, pāṭucilampu micai
yēṟṟat, tōṭuvaḻaṅku makalāmpiyiṟ, kayamakaiya vayaṉiṟaikku, meṉ
ṟoṭai vaṉkiḻāar” (maturaik. 89-93) Eṉṟār piṟarum.

Iṉik kariyavaṉ pukaiyiṉumeṉpataṟkuc caṉivāram pukaiyiṉu
meṉavumām. Iṉip pukaiyiṉum tōṉṟiṉum paṭariṉum curappa Etira
nīr vāyttalai Ōviṟantolikkumoliyallatu Āmpimutaliya Olittal
cellāmaikkuk kāraṇamākiya kāviriyeṉa muṭippiṉum Amaiyum.
pukaiyiṉum tōṉṟiṉum paṭariṉumeṉṟa Ummaikaḷ, maḻai pey
toḻil māṟa Ivaṟṟil Oṉṟē Amaiyumākavum Ivaiyellām cēri
ṉum kaṭalvaḷaṉetira nerikkumeṉak kāviriyiṉciṟappai viḷakki
niṟṟaliṟ ciṟappummaikaḷ.

div3.head: 112 - 3. kaḻaṉi......kāṉattu

div4.p:
(I – ḷ.) Aṅṅaṉam Olittalcellāk kaḻaṉiyiṟ cennelum
karumpuñ cūḻnta Iṭattaiyuṭaiya nīrnilaicceṟuviluṇṭākiya tāma
raik kāṭṭileṉka.

div3.head: 114 - 9. kampuṭkōḻiyum...paranta vōtaiyum

div4.p:
(I – ḷ.) kampuṭkōḻi mutaliyaṉa vellumpōraivalla Aracariru
var porumiṭampōlap palavēṟuvakaippaṭṭa tiṟattaiyum Oliyaiyu
muṭaiyaṉavāy Olikkum mikka Ōcaiyumeṉka.

kūkkuralum pāṭam. kampuḷ – campaṅkōḻi. kāṉakkōḻi – kāṉāṅ
kōḻi; nilavaṇmaiyākkik kāṭṭukkōḻiyeṉpārumuḷar. nīrniṟak
kākkai – nīrkkākkai. Uḷḷu – Uḷḷāṉ. Ūral – kuḷuvai; nīrmē
lūrtaliṉāl, Ākupeyar. puḷḷu – kaṇantuṭpuḷ. pōtā – perunārai,

marakkāṉārai; putā: vikāram. velpōrum, muṉaiyiṭamum viṉait
tokai. kuḻūukkural – palavāyoṉṟāṉa Ōcaiyumām.

div3.head: 120 - 24. Uḻāa nuṇṭoḷi...kāyttalaiccoriya

div4.p:
(I – ḷ.) Uḻavarāluḻappaṭāta cēṭṭukkuḻiyiṟ cēṟṟiṉuṭpukku
Aḻuntiya kaḻuvāta mayiraiyuṭaiya yākkaiyum civanta kaṇṇaiyu
muṭaiya Erumai taṉtiṉavaiyuṭaiya mutukai Uriñcutalālē puri
tēyntu Aṟṟuccaritaluṟṟa Aḻivaṟṟa purikkūṭṭiṉiṉṟa vaḷaviya pala
varukkattu nelluk kavarittoṅkalpōla viḷaintukiṭakkiṉṟa cen
neṟkatirttalai yiṭattē coriyaveṉka.
toḷi – cēṟu.

div3.head: 125 - 6. karuṅkai...Oliyē yaṉṟiyum

div4.p:
(I – ḷ.) Aṅṅaṉam neṟcoritalāṉē viṉaiñarum kaḷamaruṅ
kūṭi Oṉṟupaṭa niṉṟolikkum Oliyum; Atuvēyaṉṟiyumeṉka.

karuṅkai – valiyakai. viṉaiñar – paṟaiyar, paḷḷar mutalāyiṉār.
kaḷamar – Uḻavar kīḻkkuṭimakkaḷ. karuṅkai Iruvarkkum potu.

div3.head: 127 - 31. kaṭimalar kaḷaintu...viruntiṟ pāṇiyum

div4.p:
(I – ḷ.) kālaiyiṉmuṭitta pūkkaḷaintu muṭitta muṭiyilē muṭiyi
ṉāṟṟai naṟukkic cūṭikkoṇṭu vaḷaintavaḷaiyaiyuṭaiya tōḷum mulai
yākamuntōyntu cēṟāṭukōlattoṭu Aḻakupeṟattōṉṟic civanta
kayalpōlum periya kaṇṇaiyum ciṟiyamoḻiyaiyumuṭaiya kaṭaiciyar
kaṭuka mayakkum kaḷḷai Uṇṭu tolaittataṉāluṇṭāṉa paṇ niṟattiṟ
cērntu paḻakippōtāta pāṭṭumeṉka.

Eṉṟatu, matumayakkattāṟ patañcalittu mayaṅkap pāṭiṉāreṉṟapaṭi.
Iṉik kaṭimalar kaḷaintu muṭināṟaḻuttiyeṉpataṟkup pōkāppullākiya
kaḻunīrmutalaippaṟittu maṟittu Ataṉmītē muṭiyiṉāṟṟaip pakuntu
naṭṭeṉiṉum Amaiyum. tōḷum Ākamum tōyntucēṟāṭutal-
kaḷittu Oruvarmēl Oruvar cēṟṟai Iṟaittukkōṭal. vīṟupeṟat
tōṉṟalāvatu – mulaimēṟ ṟeṟittacēṟu kōṭṭumaṇ koṇṭāṟ
pōṉṟiruttal; “vāriya peṇṇai varukurumpai vāyttaṉapōl,
Ēriya vāyiṉu meṉceyyum——kūriya, kōṭṭāṉaik teṉṉaṉ kuḷir
cān taṇiyakalam, kōṭṭumaṇ koḷḷā mulai” (muttoḷḷā
yiram) Eṉṟāṟpōla. ciṉmoḻi – Iḻintamoḻi; cilavāṉamoḻiyu
mām. viruntiṟpāṇi – tam Icaiyiṟ putumaiyuṇṭākap pāṭum pāṭ
ṭeṉiṉum Amaiyum; Itaṉaip perumuḷaiyeṉpārumuḷar.

div3.head: 132 - 5. koḻuṅkoṭi......Ērmaṅkalamum

div4.p:
(I – ḷ.) cenneṟkatirōṭē Aṟukaiyum kuvaḷaiyaiyum kalantu
toṭutta mālaiyai mēḻiyilē cūṭṭip pārai Iraṇṭākap piḷap
pāraippōlap pōṟṟuvārtoḻap poṉṉērpūṭṭi niṉṟōr Ēraip
pāṭum Ēr maṅkalappāṭṭumeṉka.
cūṭṭit toḻaniṉṟōr pāṭum Ērmaṅkalamumeṉka.

div3.head: 136 - 7. Arintukāl......mukavaippāṭṭum

div4.p:
(I – ḷ.) nellaiyarintu pōriṭṭār cūṭṭaikkaṭāviṭutalāṉuṇ
ṭāṉa mukavaippāṭṭum,
Āvatu polipāṭutal. mukakkak koṭuttaliṉ, mukavaiyāyiṟṟu.

div3.head: 138 - 9. teṇkiṇaipporunar...makiḻicaiyōtaiyum

div4.p:
Itu kaḷavaḻi vāḻttu; Eṉṉai? “taṇpaṇaivayaluḻavaṉait, teṇ
kiṇaivaṉ ṟiruntupukaḻ kiḷantaṉṟu”; varalāṟu: “pakaṭuvāḻ keṉṟu
paṉivayalu ḷāmai, Akaṭupō laṅkaṭ ṭaṭārit——tukaṭuṭaittuk,
kuṉṟupōṟ pōrviṟ kurucil vaḷampāṭa, Iṉṟupō meṅkaṭ kiṭar”
(pu. ve. 186) Eṉavarum. kiṇai – taṭāri; puṭpaṟai yeṉpatuṅkoḷka.

(I – ḷ.) teḷinta Ōcaiyaiyuṭaiya kiṇaipporunar cerukkutalō
ṭeṭutta mārccaṉaiyaiyuṭaiya tiraṇṭa muḻaviṉatu kēṭṭōr makiḻum
Icaiyiṉatu Oliyum,

div3.head: 140 - 41. pēryāṟṟu......Avalaṅ koḷḷār

div4.p:
(I – ḷ.) periya yāṟṟaṭaikaraiyilē Ivvōcaikaḷai muṟaiyiṟ
kēṭṭu neñcam virumputalālē vaḻi naṭattaliṉ Uṇṭāṉa varut
tattai neñciṟ koḷḷārāyeṉka.

parantavōtaiyum Ārkkumoliyum viruntiṟpāṇiyum Ērmaṅkala
mum mukavaippāṭṭum makiḻicaiyōtaiyum Eṉṉumivaṟṟaip pēryāṟ
ṟaṭai karaikkaṇṇē nīrmaipeṟak kēṭṭalāl Uṇṭāṉa viruppat
tāṉē neñcil Avalaṅ koḷḷārāyeṉka.

div3.head: 142 - 7. Uḻaippulikkoṭi......Irukkai yaṉṟiyum

div4.p:
(I – ḷ.) puliyait taṉṉiṭattēyuṭaiya koṭiyaiyuyartta tērai
yuṭaiya Uravōṉākiya karikālaṉatu koṟṟattuṭaṉē maḻaikkum karup
pattait tōṟṟuvikkum Aḻalai viḷakkukiṉṟa cālaiyiṉuṇṭāṉa maṟai
yōrāṉ Ākkappaṭṭa tēvaruṇāviṉ Āvi Iṟaiyuyarnta māṭamākiya
Akaṅkaḷeṅkum pōrttalāṉē mañcu cūḻnta malaipōla māṭcimaip
paṭat tōṉṟum maṅkala maṟaiyōriruppiṭaṅkaḷum; Avaiyaṉṟiyum,

div3.head: 148 - 55. parappunīr......ceṉṉā ḷorunāḷ

div4.p:
(I – ḷ.) Irappavar cuṟṟattaiyum purappavar koṟṟattaiyum tam
Uḻaviṉiṭattē viḷaippōruṭaiya paḻaiya vali poruntiya Ūrkaḷu
mākiya Ivviruvakaiyūrkaḷaiyum Iṭaiyiṭṭa nāṭellāṅkaṇṭu naṭakku
nāṭ kātameṉṉum Ellaiyallatu naṭantu tolaikka māṭṭārāyp pala
nāḷ taṅki naṭakkiṉṟa nāḷilē Orunāḷeṉka.

tūṟṟāppoli Ālaiyiṟ pāku kāykiṉṟa pukaiyāṟ parakkappaṭṭu
Iruṭciyaiyuṭaiya mukil tavaḻnta malaipōlat tōṉṟum paḻaviṟalūr
kaḷum Eṉka.

1 kaṅkaiyāruḻaicceṉṟu kāviriyārai vāṅki Eṉṟu kūṟiṉar
nacciṉārkkiṉiyarum; tolkāppiyap pāyiravuraiyiṟ kāṇka.kāvirinīr kaṅkainīrātaliṟ kaṅkaiyiṉ putalvaraik kāviriyiṉ
putalvareṉṟār; Aṉṟiyum |“makavāy vaḷarkkun tāyāki” (7: 27) Eṉ
pataṉāṉuṅkoḷka. tōṉṟumirukkaiyum tōṉṟumūrkaḷumeṉaviyai
yum. Avvūrkaḷai Iṭaiyiṭṭa nāṭeṉka. Uṭaṉkaṇṭeṉṟār, In
nāṭṭuc ciṟappellām kaṇṭu tolaittuk kaḻitalarumaiyiṉ. putalva
rāki Uḻaviṭai viḷaippōreṉka.

div3.head: 156 - 63. Āṟṟuvī yaraṅkattu......cāraṇar tōṉṟa

div4.p:
(I – ḷ.) Āṟṟai maṟaikkum Araṅkattil vēṟiṭattillāta taṉ
maittāy vaḷainta mūṅkiṉ muḷḷāl vaḷaikkappaṭṭa vēliyaiyuṭaiya
marampayiṉṟa ceṟinta cōlaiyil tēvaruṟaitaṟkotta pūpporuntiya
torupakkattē paṭṭiṉappākkattu |2 vāṉperumaṉṟameṉpatu mutalāka Iṅkē tanturaittavaṟṟai,
Ikkātai, 20 -Ām Aṭi mutaliyavaṟṟiṟ kāṇka.vāṉperu maṉṟattup piṇṭinīḻaṟ
kaṇṇē Ulaka nōṉpikaḷ Iṭappaṭṭa cilātalattiṉ mēliruntaruḷip
perumakaṉāṟ ceyyappaṭṭa Aticayaṅkaḷ mūṉṟun tappāta Ākamanūli
ṉuṇmait taṉmaiyaiyuṭaiya tarumavoḻukkattai yāvaruṅ kēṭkum
paṭi Aruḷicceyyum |3 cāraṇar – camaṇa muṉivar. Avar: tala cāraṇar, cala cāraṇar,
pala cāraṇar, puṭpa cāraṇar, tantucāraṇar, caturaṅkula cāraṇar, caṅka
cāraṇar, Ākāca cāraṇareṉa Eṇvakaiyar; Ivviruvarākac ceṉṟu
tarumōpatēcañ ceytal Avarkaṭku Iyalpeṉpar.cāraṇar Appaṭṭiṉappākkattaiviṭṭu nīṅki
vantu tōṉṟa veṉka;

Aticaya mūṉṟāvaṉa: cakacāticayam, karmakṣayāticayam, teyvīkāti
cayameṉmaṉa.
vīṟṟuvīṟṟāki Uṭutta Oruciṟaic cāraṇar tōṉṟaveṉka.

div3.head: 164 - 9. paṇṭait tolviṉai......koḷḷāṉ

div4.p:
(I – ḷ.) muṉceyta paḻaviṉaiyellām keṭṭōṭukaveṉṟu Uṭ
koṇṭu Avar vantamaiyaik kaṇṭaṟinta kavuntiyaṭikaḷuṭaṉē ceṉṟu
Avaraṭiyilē talaiyuṟa vīḻntār; Aṅṅaṉam vīḻntavar Īṇṭuvantatu
taṉatu viḷaṅkiya kōṭpāṭṭaiyuṭaiya |4 Avati ñāṉam – Atītakamāṉa pariññāṉam; Aḵtāvatu taṉ
ṉuṭaiya muṟpiṟappai yaṟiyumaṟivu.Avati ñāṉattāl terintava
ṉāyiṉum Ārvamum ceṟṟamum taṉṉaiviṭṭup pōmpaṭi nīkkiya |5 vanta cāraṇa riruvaruḷ, Upatēcippōr mūttōrē yātaliṉ,
vīraṉeṉa Orumaiyāṟ kūṟiṉār.vīra
ṉākalālē Ivarkku varuntuṉpattiṟkut tāṉ varuntāṉākiyeṉka.

1 Iḵtu, Uriya taṉṟīṅ koḻikeṉa voḻiyīr (10: 55) Eṉpataṉ
Uraiyiṟ kūṟiyatai vaṟpuṟuttaṟku.kaṇṭaṟivukavuntiyeṉpataṉālum kālavuṇarcciyiṉmai yuṇarka.
Oṭu: Oruviṉaiyoṭu.

div3.head: 170 - 71. kaḻiperu......valviṉai

div4.p:
(I – ḷ.) mikka periya tavac ciṟappaiyuṭaiya kavunti, yāvarāṉum
Oḻikka Oḻiyātatāy nukarvikka vantuniṟkiṉṟa tīviṉaiyaik kāṇā
yeṉṟāreṉka.

kāṇāy – pārāy. Oḻikeṉa voḻiyāteṉpataṟku, nī Uriya
taṉṟīṅ koḻika (10: 55) Eṉavum Oḻiyātu Ūṭṭun tīviṉaiyai
yeṉiṉum Amaiyum.

div3.head: 172 - 3. Iṭṭa vittiṉ......Oṇṇā

div4.p:
“Uṟaṟpāla......taṇippārumil” (nālaṭi. 104) Eṉṟārākaliṉ,
tīviṉai taṉṉaiyē kūṟiṉum Amaiyum. Ummai: Eccavummai.

div3.head: 174 - 5. kaṭuṅkāl......Uṭampiṭai yuyirkaḷ

div4.p:
(I – ḷ.) kaṭiya kāṟṟaiyuṭaiya neṭiya veḷiyiliṭappaṭṭa viḷak
keṉṉumpaṭi māyiṉallatu kūṭi Uṭaṉillā, Uṭampiṉiṉṟa Uyir
kaḷumeṉṟāreṉka.

nalviṉai tīviṉaippayaṉākiya Iṉpamum tuṉpamum varuṅkāl yāva
rāṉum Oḻikkavoṇṇā veṉpatūum, yākkai nilaiyāmaiyum Ivar
tampāl Uṟuvatu kaṇṭu kavuntiyaṭikaṭkuc cāraṇar kūṟiṉāreṉa
vuṇarka. viḷakku Uvamittār; niṉaivaṟa Aḻivataṟkum, pukkuḻip pulap
paṭāmaikkum.

div3.head: 176 - 91. Aṟivaṉaṟavōṉ...potiyaṟai yōreṉa

176. Aṟivaṉ——(I – ḷ.) Ellāp poruḷaiyumaṟiyum
Aṟivaiyuṭaiyōṉ,

div4.p:
Aṟavōṉ——(I – ḷ.) Aṟañceytalaiyē toḻilāka
vuṭaiyōṉ,

Aṟivu varampikantōṉ——(I – ḷ.) yāvarumaṟiyap
paṭum Aṟivellaiyaik kaṭantōṉ,

div3.head:
177. ceṟivaṉ——(I – ḷ.) Ellāvuyirkaṭkum Itaṉāyuḷḷa
vaṉ; caliyātavaṉeṉṟumām.

div4.p:
ciṉēntiraṉ——(I – ḷ.) Eṇvakaik kaṉmaṅkaḷaiyum
cayittavaṉ,

Avaiyāvaṉa: |1 ñāṉāvaraṇīya mutaliya veṭṭum kāti Akātiyeṉa Iruvakaip
paṭṭu, nūṟṟu nāṟpatteṭṭāka viriyumeṉpar.ñāṉāvaraṇīyam, taricaṉāvaraṇīyam, vētanīyam,
mōkanīyam, Āyuṣyam, nāmam, kōttiram, Antarāyam Eṉavivai.

cittaṉ——(I – ḷ.) kirutakiruttiyaṉ = ceyyavēṇṭu
vaṉavaṟṟaic ceytumuṭittavaṉ; kaṉmaṅkaḷaik kaḻu
viṉavaṉumeṉpa.

pakavaṉ——(I – ḷ.) |2 kēvala ñāṉam – Aintu ñāṉattuḷḷum ciṟantatu. Aintu
ñāṉaṅkaḷāvaṉa:——(1) mati ñāṉam – cupāva putti; (2) curuta ñāṉam-
nūl Uṇarcci; (3) Avati ñāṉam – taṉṉuṭaiya muṟpiṟappai yaṟiyu
maṟivu; (4) maṉappariyaya ñāṉam – taṉṉuṭaiya muṟpiṟappaiyum, piṟa
ruṭaiya muṟpiṟappaiyum Aṟiyumaṟivu; (5) kēvala ñāṉam – tirikāla
Uṇarcci.kēvala ñāṉi.

div3.head:
178. taruma mutalvaṉ——(I – ḷ.) tarumaṅkaḷukku Aṭiyā
yuḷḷavaṉ,

div4.p:
talaivaṉ——(I – ḷ.) Ellāt tēvarkkum talaivaṉāka
Eṇṇappaṭṭavaṉ,
tarumaṉ——(I – ḷ.) tarumam tāṉāyuḷḷavaṉ,

div3.head:
179. poruḷaṉ——(I – ḷ.) Ākamattiṉ poruḷāyuḷḷa
vaṉ; Uṇmaip poruḷāyuḷḷavaṉeṉavumām.

div4.p: puṉitaṉ——(I – ḷ.) cuttaṉ; putiyavaṉumeṉpa.
purāṇaṉ——(I – ḷ.) paḻaiyavaṉ,
pulavaṉ——(I – ḷ.) Ellārkkum Aṟivāyuḷḷavaṉ,

div3.head: 180. ciṉavaraṉ——(I – ḷ.) ciṉattaik kīḻppaṭuttiyavaṉ,

div4.p: tēvaṉ——(I – ḷ.) tēvarkaḷukku Ātiyākiya tēvaṉ,
civakati nāyakaṉ——(I – ḷ.) vīṭṭulakiṟku nāyakaṉāyuḷḷavaṉ,

div3.head: 181. paramaṉ——mēlāṉavaṉ,

div4.p: kuṇavataṉ

(I – ḷ.) kuṇattaiyuṭaiyavaṉ; vatam - |3 viratam – Aṉuviratam, kuṇaviratam, cikṣāviratameṉa mūṉṟu
vakaippaṭum; Avaṟṟuḷ kuṇaviratam——tikkuviratam, tēcaviratam,
Anarttataṇṭa viratameṉa mūṉṟuvakaippaṭum.viratamumām.
paratti loḷiyōṉ——
(I – ḷ.) mēlāya Ulakiṟku viḷakkāyuḷḷavaṉ,

div3.head: 182. tattuvaṉ——(I – ḷ.) tattuvaṅkaḷaiyuṭaiyōṉ,

div4.p: cātuvaṉ——(I – ḷ.) Oṭuṅkiṉavaṉ,
cāraṇaṉ——(I – ḷ.) Ākācavāci.
kāraṇaṉ
(I – ḷ.) Ellāvaṟṟiṟkum kāraṇamāyuḷḷavaṉ = kāraṇapūtaṉ,

div3.head: 183. cittaṉ

div4.p: (I – ḷ.) Eṇvakaic cittikaḷaiyu muṇṭākkiṉavaṉ.
periyavaṉ——(I – ḷ.) Ellāvaṟṟāṉum periyavaṉ,
cemmal——(I – ḷ.) nāyakamūrtti,
tikaḻoḷi——(I – ḷ.) viḷaṅkum Oḷiyāyuḷḷavaṉ

div3.head: 184. Iṟaivaṉ——(I – ḷ.) Epporuḷiṉum taṅkukiṉṟavaṉ,

div4.p: kuravaṉ——(I – ḷ.) kurumūrttiyāyuḷḷavaṉ,
Iyalkuṇaṉ——(I – ḷ.) Iyalpaiyē kuṇamāka Uṭaiyavaṉ,
Eṅkōṉ——(I – ḷ.) Emmuṭaiya cuvāmi,

div3.head: 185. kuṟaivil pukaḻōṉ

div4.p: (I – ḷ.) niṟainta pukaḻaiyuṭaiyōṉ,
kuṇapporuṭ kōmāṉ——
(I – ḷ.) kuṇaṅkaḷaic campattāka vuṭaiyavaṉ,

div3.head: 186. caṅkaraṉ——(I – ḷ.) cukattaippaṇṇukiṉṟavaṉ,

div4.p: Īcaṉ——(I – ḷ.) Aicuvariyavāṉ,
cayampu——(I – ḷ.) tāṉētōṉṟiṉavaṉ,
catumukaṉ——(I – ḷ.) nāṉmukaṉ = Aticayattōṭu nāṉmukaṉ,

div3.head: 187. Aṅkam payantōṉ

div4.p:
(I – ḷ.) |1 Aṅkākamam, 12 pakuppuṭaittu. Avai varumāṟu: (1) Ācārāṅ
kam (2) cūttirakirutāṅkam, (3) stāṉāṅkam, (4) samavāyāṅkam,
(5) viyākkiyāp pirajñaptyaṅkam, (6) ñātrukatāṅkam, (7) Upāsa
kāttiyayaṉāṅkam (8) Antakkirutatacāṅkam, (9) Anuttarōpapātika
tacāṅkam, (10) piraccina viyākaraṇāṅkam, (11) vipākacūttirāṅkam,
(12) tiruṣṭivātāṅkam.Aṅkākamattai yuṇṭākkiṉavaṉ,
Arukaṉ——(I – ḷ.) pūcciyaṉ,
Aruṇmuṉi——(I – ḷ.) civapara mūrtti,

div3.head: 188. paṇṇavaṉ——(I – ḷ.) kaṭavuḷ,

div4.p: Eṇkuṇaṉ——(I – ḷ.) Eṭṭukkuṇaṅkaḷaiyuṭaiyōṉ,

Eṇkuṇamāvaṉa:——Anantañāṉam, Anantavīriyam, Anantatari
caṉam, Anantacukam, nirnnāmam, nirkkōttiram, nirāyuṣyam, Aḻiyā
viyalpeṉa vivai.

pāttil paḻamporuḷ——(I – ḷ.) pakuttaṟkariya purāṇap
poruḷāyuḷḷavaṉ; Ōṭṭamaṟṟa poṉṉaiyoppā
ṉeṉṟumām.

div3.head: 189. viṇṇavaṉ——(I – ḷ.) cuvarkkavāci,

div4.p:
vēta mutalvaṉ——(I – ḷ.) |1 Ākama mūṉṟāvaṉa: Aṅkākamam, pūrvākamam, pahucurutiyākama
meṉpaṉa.Ākamamūṉṟiṟkum mutalā
yuḷḷavaṉ.

viḷaṅkoḷi——(I – ḷ.) Aññāṉaviruḷ nīṅka viḷaṅku
moḷi.

div3.head: 190 - 91. Ōtiya vētattu......potiyaṟai yōreṉa

div4.p:
(I – ḷ.) Innāmaṅkaḷai yuṭaiyōṉāl Ōtappaṭṭa Ākamamākiya
viḷakkoḷiyaip peṟṟāṟpōntēṟuvatallatu yāvarum piṟaviyākiya
ciṟaiyiṉiṉṟum pōkamāṭṭāreṉṟāreṉka.
2 Itu puḻukkaṟaiyeṉavum vaḻaṅkum; maṇi. 3: 95; 23: 60.potiyaṟai – tuvāramillāta kīḻaṟai.

div3.head: 192 - 3. cāraṇar mēṟkoṇṭu

div4.p:
(I – ḷ.) Iṅṅaṉam cāraṇar Aruḷicceyta Uṇmaimoḻiyaik
kēṭṭut tavattiṟku mutalviyākiya kavuntiyaṭikaḷum tamatu kaikaḷait
talaimēl vaittukkoṇṭu niṉṟukūṟuvār:——

div3.head: 194 - 5. Orumūṉṟu......ceviyakan tiṟavā

div4.p:
(I – ḷ.) Eṉatu cevikaḷ kāmavekuḷi mayakkaṅkaḷaik keṭuttava
ṉāl Ōtappaṭṭa ñāṉapātamākiya tirumoḻiyaik kēṭṭaṟkut tiṟappi
ṉallatu piṟitoṉṟaṟkut tiṟappaṉavallaveṉṟāreṉka.
Avittal Aṭakkutalumām.

div3.head: 196 - 7. kāmaṉai......navilā teṉṉā

div4.p:
(I – ḷ.) Eṉnāvum kāmaṉceyalai veṉṟavaṉuṭaiya Āyirat
teṭṭu vakaippaṭṭa nāmam naviliṉallatu piṟitoṉṟaṉai navilā
teṉṟāreṉka.

div3.head: 198 - 9. Aivarai veṉṟōṉ......kāṇā veṉkaṇ

div4.p:
(I – ḷ.) Eṉatukaṇkaḷum Aivakaippaṭṭa Intiriyaṅkaḷaiyum veṉ
ṟavaṉuṭaiya Aṭiyiṇaikaḷaik kāṇiṉallatu piṟitoru tēvaraṭiyiṇai
kaḷaik kaiyakattē kāṇiṉum kāṇāveṉṟāreṉka.

Aivar, ceṟaliṉkaṇ tiṇaimayakkam. Iṉik kaivaraikāṇiṉum
pāṭamāyiṉ, kaivaraikāṇal kaṇviḻittalākki viḻittiruppiṉum
kāṇāveṉka.

div3.head: 200 - 201. Aruḷaṟam pūṇṭōṉ......poruntātu

div4.p:
(I – ḷ.) Eṉatu payaṉaṟṟayākkai Aruḷāl Aṟattaippūṇṭō
ṉuṭaiya tirumēṉipporuṭṭup pūmiyiṟporuntiṉallatu piṟitoṉ
ṟaṟkup poruntāteṉṟāreṉka.
Aruḷaṟam: Ummaittokaiyumām.

div3.head: 202 - 3. Aruka raṟavaṉ..........kuviyā

div4.p:
(I – ḷ.) Eṉatu Irukaiyum Arukarkku Aṟattaikkūṟuvōṉākiya
Aṟivaṉporuṭṭu Eṉcirattiṉmicaiyē kuviyiṉallatu piṟitoru
tēvar poruṭṭuk kuviyāveṉṟāreṉka.
Arukar – Iruṭikaḷ.

div3.head: 204 - 5. malarmicai......poṟāatu

div4.p:
(I – ḷ.) Eṉatu talaiyiṉucciyum pūviṉmītē naṭantōṉuṭaiya
malaraṭiyākiya Aṇiyai Aṇiyap poṟuppiṉallatu piṟitoṉṟaṉaiyum
Aṇiyappoṟāteṉṟāreṉka.

div3.head: 206 - 7. Iṟutiyi liṉpattu......peyarātu

div4.p:
(I – ḷ.) Eṉmaṉamum Īṟiliṉpamākiya Anantacukattaiyuṭaiya
Iṟaivaṉaruḷicceyta Ākamamākiyamoḻiyai Uruvēṟa Ōtippuṭai
peyariṉallatu piṟitorumoḻiyaiyōtip puṭaipeyarāteṉṟā
reṉka.
maṟutara – mīḷavum.

div3.head:
208 - 13. Eṉṟava ṉicaimoḻi......paṇintaṉar
pōntu

div4.p:
(I – ḷ.) tamkaiyait talaimēṟkoṇṭuniṉṟu, kavuntiyaṭikaḷ,
tiṟavā; navilātu; kāṇā; poruntātu; kuviyā; poṟātu; peyarā
teṉṟukoṇṭu Avaṉ pukaḻmoḻikaḷai Ēttakkēṭṭu Ataṟkup
poruntiya cāraṇar Avviṭattiṭappaṭṭa cilāvaṭṭattiṉiṉṟu
meḻuntu Ataṟku Oru muḻavuyaram mēlāniṉṟu piṟappaittarumpācam
kavuntikkuk keṭuvatāka veṉṟukūṟi Antaravaḻiyāka viraintucel
kiṉṟavarainōkkit toḻutu pācaṅkaḷ Aṟukaveṉṟu paṇintaṉarāyp
pōnteṉka.

div3.head: 214 - 8. kāraṇi pūmpoḻil...pūmpoḻi liruntuḻi

div4.p:
(I – ḷ.) mukilaiyaṇinta poḻilaiyuṭaiya kāviriyākiya periya
yāṟṟiṟku mātarum kaṇavaṉum kavuntiyaṭikaḷum paḷḷiyōṭattēṟip
pōyt teṉkaraiyaicceṉṟeytip pōtukaḷ cūḻntukiṭakkiṉṟa
tōr poliviṉaiyuṭaiya poḻiliṭattē ceṉṟiruntapoḻutileṉka.

div3.head: 219 - 20. vampap parattai......ceṉṟōr

div4.p:
(I – ḷ.) |1 Iṭaṅkaḻikāmam – mikka kāmam; maṇi. 10: 22; 18: 119.Iṭaṅkaḻikāmattaḷākiya kuṇṭakkaṇikaiyoruttiyum
Oruvaṉuṅkūṭi Ivarkaḷ Irukkiṉṟa maṇamparantatōr poḻiliṭattē
Aṇukiṉarāyc ceṉṟavareṉka.

vampapparattai – putiya parattaittaṉmaiyaiyuṭaiyāḷ; kuṇṭa
meṉṟapaṭi. Iṉi, maṉaveḻucciyāl tōṉṟiṉapaṭi collittiriyum
parattaiyeṉṟumām. vaṟumoḻiyāḷaṉ – payaṉilcollāḷaṉ; viṭa
ṉeṉṟapaṭi.

div3.head: 221 - 2. kāmaṉun tēviyum......Aṟikuva meṉṟē

div4.p:
(I – ḷ.) Ivviṭattuvantirukkiṉṟa kāmaṉaiyum Iratiyaiyumok
kum Ivarkaḷai yāreṉṟukēṭṭu Aṟiyakkaṭavōmeṉṟu colliyeṉka.

Iṉi, Ivviṭattuvantavivar kāmaṉum tēviyumē; Allarāyiṉ,
yāreṉak kēṭṭaṟikuvameṉṟāreṉiṉum Amaiyum. Ipporuṭkup
pōli Oppil pōli. Īṅkivar: Īṅku – Ivviṭattu. kēṭṭīṅku:
Īṅku – Ippoḻutu.

div3.head: 223 - 4. nōṟṟuṇal yākkai......viṉava

div4.p:
(I – ḷ.) |1 “Ōvā tiraṇṭuvavu maṭṭamiyum paṭṭiṉiviṭṭu” (cīvaka. 1547)Uvāmutaliya viratanāṭkaḷiṟ paṭṭiṉiviṭṭuṇṭalāṉ
melintayākkaiyaiyum nuṇṇiya tavattaiyumuṭaiyīr! nummoṭu
kūṭi vaḻivanta Ivar yāreṉṟu viṉavaveṉka.
Āṟṟuvaḻippaṭṭōr – vaḻiyiṟ kūṭivantōr.

div3.head: 224 - 6. Eṉmakkaḷ......paripulam piṉareṉa

div4.p:
(I – ḷ.) Avviruvarum Ivviruvaraiyum viṉavutalkaṇṭa kavunti
yaṭikaḷ Ivar Eṉmakkaḷkāṇum; nīrcoṉṉa kāmaṉum tēviyumallar;
māṉiṭayākkaiyar; vaḻivarum varuttattāl mikavum varuntiṉar; Ava
ruḻaiccellātē viṭappōmiṉeṉṟāreṉka.
pari – mikuti; paripulampiṉar: Oru collumām.

div3.head: 227 - 8. Uṭaṉvayiṟṟōrkaḷ......kaṟṟaṟin tīreṉa

div4.p:
(I – ḷ.) nūlkaḷaiyuṅkaṟṟu Ataṉpayaṉaiyumaṟintavarē! Oru
vayiṟṟu Uṭaṉpiṟantōr koḻunaṉum maṉaiviyumāyk kūṭivāḻakkaṭava
teṉṟu nīr kaṟṟanūlkaḷiṟ collikkiṭappatumuṇṭō? Uṇṭākiṟ
collumeṉṟāreṉka.
kaṟṟaṟintīreṉṟatu Ikaḻcci; Ivvāṟō nīr kaṟṟaṉavumeṉpatām.

div3.head: 229 - 40. tīmoḻi kēṭṭu......Uraiyīrōveṉa

div4.p:
(I – ḷ.) Iṅṅaṉam Ivar Ikaḻntamoḻiyaik kēṭṭalāṟ cevi
yaip putaittuk kaṇṇaki naṭuṅka, Eṉ pūṅkōtaipōlvāḷai Ivar
Ikaḻkiṉṟaṉar; Ivvikaḻcciyāl tuṭakkumuṭkaḷaiyuṭaiya kāṭṭil
nuḻaintutiriyum mutunariyākakkaṭavareṉak kavuntiyaṭikaḷ Iṭṭa cāpam
tavattiṉ viḷaivākiya cāpamātalāl Avaraic ceṉṟu pūṇṭatātaliṉ,
Aṅṅaṉam viḷainta paṭiyaiyaṟiyārākiya kōtaiyum nampiyum kuṟiyanari
yiṉatu neṭiya kuralākak kūvum viḷiyaikkēṭṭu naṭuṅkicceṉṟu
Oḻukka neṟiyiṉiṉṟum nīṅkiyōr nīrmaiyallātaṉavaṟṟaic colli
ṉum Iḵtu Avar Aṟiviṉmaiyāṟ kūṟiyataṉṟōveṉṟu Uyarntōr
tamataṟivāṉ Uṇaravēṇṭum; ceytavattīr, Ummuṭaiya tirumuṉ
piḻaitta Ivarkku Iṉic cāpanīṅki Uytal Uṭaittāṅkālattai
Uraittaruḷīreṉṟu kūṟaveṉka.

pōlum: Oppilpōli. mutunari – Ōri. naṭuṅkiyeṉṟār, tam
poruṭṭākaviḷaitaliṉ. Ōkāram: Icainiṟai. Aṭikaḷ maṉattāl
niṉaittiṭṭa cāpamātalāṟ paṭṭataiyaṟiyāreṉṟār. Iṅṅaṉam Aṟi
yātavarkaḷ Avar coṉṉa Ikaḻcciyālum Itaṟku Ivarallatu vēṟu
capikkavuriyāriṉmaiyāṉum Uytikkālamuraiyīreṉṟār. viḷi – Ōrik
kural. neṟiyi ṉīṅkiyōr nīrala kūṟiṉum, Aṟiyā maiyeṉ ṟaṟiyal
vēṇṭum Eṉṉuntuṇaiyum Avaruṭkōḷ. piṉṉatai Aṭikaṭkuk
kūṟiṉār.

div3.head: 241 - 5. Aṟiyāmaiyiṉiṉṟu...cāpaviṭai ceytu

div4.p:
(I – ḷ.) tamatu muppoṟikaḷāṉvarum tuṉpameṉpataṉai Aṟintu
kūṟāmaiyāṉē Iṉṟu Iḻipiṟappaiyuṟṟa Ivar Uṟaiyūr matiṟpuṟamā
kiya kāvaṟkāṭṭiṟṟirintu paṉṉiraṇṭu tiṅkaḷ Iṅṅaṉam tuṉpa
muḻanta piṉṉar muṉṉaippiṟappaip peṟuvārākaveṉac cāpaviṭai
ceyteṉka.

Iṉṟu Iḻipiṟappuṟṟōreṉṟatu neṭuṅkālam tavañceytu peṟṟa
makkaṭpiṟappai Oruvārttaiyiṉiḻantu Iḻipiṟappuṟṟāreṉṟavāṟu;
Eṉavē |1 kuṟaḷ. 127.yākāvārāyiṉum nākāttal vēṇṭumeṉpatāyiṟṟu; |“Āk
kap paṭukku maruntaḷaivāyp peyvikkum, pōkkappaṭukkum pulainarakat
tuyppikkum, kākkap paṭuvaṉa vintiya maintiṉum, nākkalla tillai
naṉivellu māṟē” (vaḷaiyāpati) Eṉpatūumāyiṟṟu; nocci
yorupuṭai yeṉṟatu vēṟu Araṇvēṇṭāmai viḷakkiṟṟu; |“nocci
vēlit titta ṉuṟantai” (Akanā. 122: 21) Eṉṟatumatu. Iḻipiṟappu-
vilaṅkiṉ piṟappu. muṉṉaiyuruvam – vampapparattaiyum vaṟumoḻiyā
ḷaṉumeṉavumām.

div3.head: 245 - 8. tavapperuñ ciṟappiṉ......pukkaṉar purinteṉ.

div4.p:
(I – ḷ.) tavattāṉmikka ciṟappaiyuṭaiya kavuntiyaṭikaḷum tēvi
yum kaṇavaṉum muṟampōluñceviyaiyuṭaiya yāṉaiyaic camariṭattuk
keṭutta puṟattē ciṟaiyaiyuṭaiya kōḻiyeṉṉunakariṉkaṇṇē
viruppattōṭu pukkāreṉka.

vāraṇam – kōḻi; Āvatu Uṟaiyūr. muṟkālattu Orukōḻi
yāṉaiyaip pōrtolaittalāṉ Annilattiṟceyta nakarkkuk kōḻi
yeṉpatu peyarāyiṟṟu. Annakar kāṇkiṉṟapoḻutu ciṟaiyum kaḻuttu
māka Ākkiyavataṉāṟ puṟampē ciṟaiyaiyuṭaiya kōḻiyeṉṟāyiṟṟeṉ
pārumuḷar; Aṟṟaṉṟu; puṟañciṟaivāraṇameṉpatu cilēṭai:
puṟattē ciṟaiyaiyuṭaiya kōḻiyum, puṟañcēriyaiyuṭaiya Uṟaiyūrum;
“puṟañciṟaip poḻilum” (14: 1) Eṉpa mēlumākaliṉ.

paṇintaṉarpōntu Eyti Iruntuḻic ceṉṟōr viṉavap paripulam
piṉareṉak kaṭavatumuṇṭō kaṟṟaṟintīreṉac ceviyakamputaittu
naṭuṅka mutunariyākeṉak kaṭṭiyatātaliṉ Uraiyīrōveṉap peṟuka
Īṅkivareṉac cāpaviṭaiceytu kavuntiyum tēviyum kaṇavaṉum purintu
pukkāreṉka.

Iḵtu Ellāvaṭiyun tammuḷottumuṭitaliṉ nilaimaṇṭilavā
ciriyappā.
(10) nāṭukāṇ kātai muṟṟiṟṟu.
div4.head: kaṭṭurai

div3.head:
1 - 2. muṭiyuṭai...Utittōr——mūvēntaruḷḷum cōḻar
kulattu Utittōruṭaiya; mūvar – cōḻar pāṇṭiyar cērar.
3. Aṟaṉ

div4.p: “Aṟaṉōmpaṭai” (5: 179) Eṉṟatu tarumācaṉameṉpārumuḷar.

maṟaṉ——“Imaiyava ruṟaiyuñ cimaiyap piṭarttalaik, koṭu
variyoṟṟi” (5: 97-8) Eṉṟatu.
Āṟṟal——“kōnakar kātta” (6: 8) Eṉṟatu.

div3.head: 4. mūtūrppaṇpu mēmpaṭutal

div4.p: “pukārēyāyiṉum” (1: 16) Eṉṟatu.

div3.head: 5. viḻavumaliciṟappu——

div4.p: “viṇṇavar talaivaṉai viḻunī rāṭṭi” (5: 168) Eṉṟatu.

viṇṇavarvaravu——“Antarat tuḷḷō raṟiyā marapiṉ, vantu
kāṇkuṟūum vāṉavaṉ viḻavu” (6: 72-3) Eṉṟatu.

div3.head:
7. kuṭi——“Irappōr cuṟṟamum purappōr koṟṟamum, Uḻa
viṭai viḷaippōr” (10: 149-50) Eṉṟatu.

div4.p:
kūḻiṉ perukkam——“kumarik kūṭṭiṟ koḻumpal luṇavu,
kavaric cenneṟ kāyttalaic coriya” (10: 123-4) Eṉṟatu.

div3.head: 7 - 8. Avar tam teyvakkāvirit tītutīr ciṟappu——

div4.p: “kariyavaṉ......Olikkum” (10: 102-9) Eṉṟatu.

div3.head:
9. poyyā vāṉam putuppuṉal poḻital——“maḻaik
karuvuyirkku maḻaṟṟika ḻaṭṭiṉ maṟaiyōr” (10: 143-4) Eṉṟatu.

10. Araṅku——“nūṉeṟi marapi ṉaraṅkam” (3: 99) Eṉṟatum,
“tōṟṟiya varaṅkil” (3: 106) Eṉṟatum.

div4.p: Āṭal——“Āṭalum” (3: 16) Eṉṟatu

div3.head: 1 - 4. tiṅkaṇmūṉṟu......Aṟivaṉai vaṇaṅki

div4.p:
(I – ḷ.) kōtaikaḷ tāḻnta piṇṭiyiṉatu vaḷaviya niḻaṟ
kaṇṇē mūṉṟu tiṅkaḷaiyaṭukkiṉāṟpōlum tirumukkuṭaiyiṉatu kīḻ
Iḷanāyiṟṟiṉatu Oḷiyiṉum Oḷi ciṟappavirunta Aṟivaṉai vaṇaṅki
yeṉka.

tiṅkaḷ mutaliya |1 mūṉṟāvaṉa:——cantiraṉ, cūriyaṉ, Akkiṉi.mūṉṟeṉiṉumām. mukkuṭaiyāvaṉa: cantirā
tittam, nittiya viṉōtam, cakalapācaṉameṉpaṉa. Iṉṉurupu
tokkatu; poruvām poruṇmai tantatu. tikaḻtal – viḷaṅkutal.
ciṟantu – ciṟappa. |kōtaitāḻpiṇṭi Eṉṟār - |2 Ivvacōku mālaiyākap pūkkumeṉpatai, “muḻāttiraṇ moym
malart tāman tāḻntumēl, vaḻāttiru malarelā malarntu vaṇṭiṉam,
kuḻāttoṭu miṟaikoḷak kuṉintu kūṅkuyil, viḻākkoḷa virintatu
vīraṉ piṇṭiyē” (cīvaka. 3012) Eṉṉum ceyyuḷāluṇarka.Avaṉpiṇṭi
kaṭavuṭṭaṉmaiyāṉ Eññāṉṟum mālaiyākap pūkkumātaliṉ.
Ātiyiltōṟṟat taṟivaṉeṉṟatu Ātiyiṉmaiyait tōṟṟamāka
vuṭaiyaṉeṉṟatām; Eṉavē Iṉañceppi Antamiṉmaiyai muṭivāka
vuṭaiyaṉeṉpatūumām; Ākavē Ātiyum Antamum Illātava
ṉeṉṟavāṟām; Eṉavē taṉakkup piṟitoruvar mutalātalillātava
ṉeṉpatām. Iṉṉum Itaṟku yāvarkkum tāṉē mutalāyavaṉeṉ
ṟuraippiṉum Amaiyum. Ātiyiṟṟōṟṟam pāṭamāyiṉ, Ātikkālat
tiṉum muṟṟōṉṟiyavaṉeṉka. Eṉṟa karuttu kālattiṉ muṟṟōṉṟum
poruḷkaḷ yāvumiṉmaiyiṉ, Ataṉiṉum muṟṟōṉṟiyava ṉeṉpa
tām. Aṟivaṉ – Uṟaiyūrilarukaṉ. vaṇaṅki – mutaṉāṭ (10: 248)
purintu pukkavar vaṇaṅkiyeṉka.

div3.head: 5 - 8. kantaṉ paḷḷi......māṇpuṟamoḻintu

div4.p:

(maturaik. 41); “Ippōḻtu pōḻteṉ ṟatuvāyppak kūṟiya, Ek
kaṭavuḷ” (kalit. 93: 12-3.)kaṭavu

kaṇ cāraṇar kūṟiya moḻiyaik kavuntiyaṭikaḷum Iṉimaiyuṟa moḻin
teṉka.

nikkantaṉaik kantaṉeṉṟār. Antil, Acaiyumām. Araṅkam-
muṟkūṟiya Āṟṟuvīyaraṅkam; tiruvaraṅkamumām. Akaṉpoḻil – Am
maram payil Aṭukkam. cāraṇar - |5 cilap. 10: 160.perumpeyaraiyariṭṭa cilātalattut
tarumam cāṟṟumcāraṇar; Avar kūṟiya moḻi, “Oḷiyuṟi ṉallatu,
pōtār piṟavip potiyaṟaiyōr” (10: 190-91) Eṉṟa moḻi;
Ataṉaik kavuntiyaṭikaḷum moḻinteṉka.

div3.head: 8 - 9. Āṅku..........Aṭaṅki

div4.p: (I – ḷ.) Aṉṟu |6 cāvakar caiṉarkaḷil Illaṟattār; Ivarkaḷai £srāvakareṉpar.cāvakar Uṟaiviṭattu viṭṭut taṅkiyeṉka.

Eṉṟatu kālaippoḻutil vāymoḻikēṭṭu māṭappuṇaipōkit
teṉkaraiyeytip pūmpoḻiliruntuḻic cāpaviṭaiceytu mālaip
poḻutiṉkaṇ puṟañciṟaivāraṇam purintu pukkaṉareṉavē Aṟṟai
ñāṉṟu taṅkutal kūṟa vēṇṭātu muṭiyum; muṭiyavē vaḻināṭcāvakar
Uṟaikiṉṟa viṭattē taṅkiṉārāy Oṭuṅkiyeṉka. Avareṉak kaṭavu
ḷaraic cuṭṭiṉ, Avaruṟaiviṭam kantaṉ paḷḷiyāmākalāṉum, Āṇṭu
Aṭaṅkāmai colla vēṇṭāvākalāṉum Avareṉṟatu cāvakarai
yeṉka. kaṭavuḷarkkellām mātavattāṭṭi māṇpuṟa moḻinteṉavē
kavuntiyaṭikaḷ kantaṉ paḷḷiyuṭ pukkamaiyuṇarka. Iṅṅaṉaṅ kūṟiyatu,
“Āṟaiṅkātam” (10: 42) Eṉṟamaiyāṉum “kāvata mallatu kaṭavā
rākip, paṉṉāṭṭaṅkic ceṉṉā ḷorunāḷ” (10: 154-5) Eṉṟamai
yāṉum, Īṇṭum “Aṉṟava ruṟaiviṭat talkiṉa raṭaṅki” Eṉṟamaiyā
ṉum, cilanāṭ ceṉṟavaḻic celavoḻintoḻintu Āṇṭāṇṭiruntu
Āṟic ceṉṟamai Uṇarttaṟkeṉak koḷka.

div3.head: 10 - 14. teṉṟicai maruṅkiṟ......pukkuḻi

div4.p:
(I – ḷ.) teṉṟicaikkaṇṇē cellutalai viruppamuṟutalāṉē
kōḻiyūrai vaikaṟaiyāmattē kaḻintu cellāniṉṟuḻi veyyōṉ
vantu muṉṉark kuṇaticaiyai viḷakkip piṉṉart tāṉ tōṉṟiṉā
ṉāka, vaḷaviya nīrniṟainta marutanilamum vāviyuñciṟantatōr Iḷamarak
kāviṉ maṇṭapattē ceṉṟu pukkaviṭatteṉka

vāraṇam – kōḻiyūr. vaṇaṅki moḻintu Alkiṉaraṭaṅki virup
puṟṟu vāraṇaṅkaḻintu tōṉṟiṉavaḷavilē Irukkaipukkuḻiyeṉka.
viḷaṅki – viḷakki; vikāram.
